alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Holmes; Stark; Wayne (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 23 at 2:43PM EDT until August 23 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Ashland County in north central Ohio... Southwestern Stark County in northeastern Ohio... Wayne County in northeastern Ohio... Holmes County in northeastern Ohio... * Until 330 PM EDT. * At 242 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Doylestown to near Wooster to 8 miles southeast of West Salem to near Polk, moving southeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Canton, Wooster, Ashland, Millersburg, Massillon, Orrville, Berlin, Walnut Creek, Loudonville, Brewster, Navarre, Dalton, Shreve, West Salem, Waynesburg, East Sparta, Killbuck, Hayesville, Holmesville and Polk. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
